ratings.comment: The course organization is pretty effective. Parthy really created a welcoming environment for us to study English and socializing. The atmosphere of the course is engaging.
Love her class! She is super clear and tells you exactly how to do all the parts of a paper. If you pay attention and ask what you're not sure about, you will do well.

She is poorly prepared for classes and crazy about attendance without clearly explaining its importance at the beginning of the semester. she always tends to respond to questions with more questions rather than providing direct answers, which makes communication challenging. She is a tough grader and teaches poorly.

Cannot agree more with her strict grading in Paper for this course, but overall she gives good lectures. Showing up in lecture for attendance and enhance your writing will help you succeed in this course.
no

Very useful feedback! She helped me to improve my summary skills a lot this semester! Although she graded very strictly in ESL 116, but it does not a matter! This is a P/F course. We just need to learn something from this course, and there is not any effect even with a result of C!
Class environment was really fun. Helpful feedback. My writing improved a lot from this class!

It's a decent course load for a pass/fail class. Parthy is a great instructor and she helps students adequately outside of teaching hours. I think her grading is fair and justified. It helps prepare students for 117.

Parthy did an amazing job transitioning to online instruction. She's extremely organized. This made my online learning experience top-notch. ESL118 is hard, but if you do exactly what she says, you won't be disappointed. Parthy is someone that other teachers need to learn from when it comes to transitioning to online classes. She's one of the best!

I have to say she is a good teacher but a tough grader. She also gives too much homework. She makes you feel like you are taking a 5-credit course. After all, ESL118 is a required course for all international students. If we have other options, no one would choose ESL.
Parthy is one of the best instructors I've had at UW. She answers emails right away and gives lots of feedback and help. She is always well organized and clear.
Tough grader. A lot of homework.

Parthy gives way too much homework. You will never have a free weekend to have fun because of her heavy homework. She is the worst when it comes to attendance and grading. I do not recommend her at all.

There is lots of work to do in her class. An 3-credit course can turn into 6-7credits theoretically. Still, you can learn a lot with even more efforts you put into. Suitable for students who think their life is not that hard and want to learn more.

Parthy gives solid and clear feedback to the writing projects. Even though the second draft's score is usually low, if you revise the essay according to her advice, rubric and really think about how to improve, you'll be fine when it comes to the final draft. She is a nice instructor and a fair grader.

Parthy is a mean grader and she is not clear in class. She even didn't prepare for class. She creates slides in class and for most of the time, there are no instructions in class. She asks us to discuss before we even don't know how to make the discussion better. She graded tough she has a high requirement of our essay quality.
Amazing instructor! Parthy gives very clear feedback and her lectures are fun.

Although ESL 118 may not have the best reputation, this class was made much better by having Parthy as a professor. I would highly recommend choosing Parthy, she is a fair grader and a very nice lady.
Parthy is a great teacher who cares a lot about her students. And she is really friendly and easy to talk to. You can learn a lot through her lecture.

Parthy is a very nice instructor. She respects your idea and gives feedback on every assignments. She is not a easy grader, but I think the grades are fair. Go to her office hour. You can definitely ask any question you have about your paper, and she is really helpful.

Parthy  is an amazing instructor. However, her grading is tough and she requires all the assignments right on time. She takes class participation and attendance very seriously. She is funny and makes the class interesting.

She is a good instructor; organized, fair and helpful. The course is tough tho. She is not the "easy grader" you guys are looking for; however, she is fair and you will be fine if you put efforts in the course.

She is a good teacher and cares a lot about her students. This class is design to make you improve your writing a lot and you will if you work hard. Attendance is mandatory in all the ESL classes and this one is no different.  Parthy gives a lot of individual help during conferences which made my writing improve a lot. I recommend this teacher.
super bad teacher! Not clear with everything!

I took ESL 117 which requires above 70% to pass; so having Parthy as a teacher wasn't too bad for being in an ESL 117 class. But if it was ESL 118 which is actually graded, I would not take it from Parthy since she is pretty tight about stuff But, Parthy is a fair teacher. I mean she is not a jerk like some other ESL teachers. She is not that bad.
She is very helpful. Just take assignments seriously and pay attention to her feedback. You will be fine.
she is crazy about the attendance and grade personally. out of 15 students, she failed 4 students in a single semester. Do not take her class unless you are super diligent
Although she is not a lenient grader, she really helps me a lot in improving my academic writing. As long as you are willing to work for it, definitely go for her class. You can learn a lot.

She is strict and really dedicated. She checks daily homework carefully. You have to work hard on all essays. Don't be lazy in her class. Since this course is mandatory for international students and only on a pass/fail level, think carefully about whether to take her class.
